short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sally is an agent-based Copilot that can help you writing, and building your own Agents, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sally is an agent-based Copilot designed to help with writing and improve productivity. This extension offers the following features:

1. Enhances writing, such as expanding, condensing, polishing, and generating titles
2. Translates selected text into other languages
3. Image generation, using DALL-E for image creation
4. Generate Article
5. Generate Presentation
6. AI-Powered LaTeX Writing in Overleaf
7. AI-Powered Writing Assistance for Medium
8. Support extract information from image using GPT-4o
9. Chat with web page content

Additionally, it provides the capability to customize AI agents, helping you build your own agents and collaborate with multiple intelligences via @.

Notes:
If you have your own Open AI Key, you can use this extension for free.
